pages.title: Void Blossom
pages.text: Level: <level_t2>$(br2)Spawns in underground caves in the $(bold)Overworld$()[$(copy:bosses_of_mass_destruction:void_blossom)bosses_of_mass_destruction:void_blossom$()].$(br)You can locate this structure in the $(bold)Overworld$() using a $(key)Void Lily$().

$(br)$(key)Void Blossom$() has extremely strong regeneration. Prepare the $(key)Spell Curse$() enchantment before the fight to reduce its healing.$(br2)Defeating $(key)Void Blossom$() drops a $(key)Void Thorn$() (used to craft $(boss/t1/day_night)Chaos Orbs$()), and also drops $(key)Crystal Fruit$() which can be used to craft the $(mechanic/loot_charm)Chaos Loot Charm$().
